summary: A utility package for the NeMo text‑to‑speech collection that centralises common operations needed during model development, training and evaluation. It includes callbacks for automatic audio and visual artifact generation, helpers for data shaping, logging, gradient handling and device placement, distributed‑training support, spline‑based mathematical transforms, and dataset‑preparation tools such as audio loading, segmentation, filtering, padding, weighted sampling and alignment prior generation.
business_intent: Accelerate the creation, training and deployment of high‑quality TTS models by providing reusable, production‑ready components that simplify data preprocessing, model monitoring, distributed execution and mathematical processing within the NeMo ecosystem.
